title: SpaceX's Billion-Dollar Acquisition of xAI
description: SpaceX has acquired xAI in a high-value deal, with SpaceX's valuation reaching $1 trillion and xAI valued at $250 billion. The acquisition highlights SpaceX's strategic expansion into artificial intelligence, marking a significant milestone in the aerospace industry.
content:
In a groundbreaking transaction, SpaceX has completed its acquisition of xAI, elevating its valuation to an extraordinary $1 trillion. The source reveals that xAI has been appraised at $250 billion as part of the deal.

title: OpenAI Accuses Musk’s xAI of Destroying Evidence in Court Fight
description: OpenAI accused Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company of “systematic and intentional destruction” of evidence in xAI’s lawsuit accusing the ChatGPT maker of trying to thwart competition in emerging markets.

title: PLTR stock price today: Palantir Q4 earnings beat estimates as AI demand fuels record U.S. growth and bullish 2026 outlook
description: Palantir Technologies has exceeded Wall Street's fourth-quarter expectations. Strong demand for its artificial intelligence tools from businesses and the US government fueled this success. The company reported significant revenue growth, particularly in its US operations. Palantir also provided optimistic revenue guidance for the upcoming year. This performance highlights the increasing adoption of advanced AI solutions across various sectors.

title: Exclusive: OpenAI is unsatisfied with some Nvidia chips and looking for alternatives, sources say
description: OpenAI is unsatisfied with some of Nvidia’s latest artificial intelligence chips, and it has sought alternatives since last year, eight sources familiar with the matter said, potentially complicating the relationship between the two highest-profile players in the AI boom.
content: SAN FRANCISCO, Feb 2 (Reuters) - OpenAI is unsatisfied with some of Nvidia’s latest artificial intelligence chips, and it has sought alternatives since last year, eight sources familiar with the matter said, potentially complicating the relationship ... [5339 chars]
